subIssues.text: Reduce unused JavaScript, Potential savings of 41KiB
Serve static assets with an efficient cache policy, 5 resources found
Initial server response time was short, Root document took 130ms
Use video formats for animated content
Remove duplicate modules in JavaScript bundles
Avoid serving legacy JavaScript to modern browsers
Avoids enormous network payloads, Total size was 271KiB
Avoids an excessive DOM size, 42 elements
Avoid chaining critical requests, 5 chains found
All text remains visible during webfont loads
Minimize third-party usage, Third-party code blocked the main thread for 0ms
Uses passive listeners to improve scrolling performance
Has a `<meta name="viewport">` tag with `width` or `initial-scale`
ARIA attributes are used as specified for the element's role
`[aria-hidden="true"]` is not present on the document `<body>`
`[aria-hidden="true"]` elements do not contain focusable descendents
Elements use only permitted ARIA attributes
`[aria-*]` attributes are valid and not misspelled
Background and foreground colors have a sufficient contrast ratio
Heading elements appear in a sequentially-descending order
`<html>` element has a valid value for its `[lang]` attribute
`[user-scalable="no"]` is not used in the `<meta name="viewport">` element and the `[maximum-scale]` attribute is not less than 5.
Touch targets have sufficient size and spacing.
Avoids requesting the geolocation permission on page load
Avoids requesting the notification permission on page load
Ensure CSP is effective against XSS attacks
Ensure proper origin isolation with COOP
Allows users to paste into input fields
Displays images with correct aspect ratio
Has a `<meta name="viewport">` tag with `width` or `initial-scale`
Document uses legible font sizes, 100% legible text
No browser errors logged to the console
No issues in the `Issues` panel in Chrome Devtools
Page has successful HTTP status code
